casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jathiyah AL-BAYYINAH. No. 550A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State. Janet Moore, Assistant Public Defender, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, for Jathiyah al-Bayyinah.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Jathiyah al-Bayyinah) shall have up to and including the 16th day of December 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of October 2004."
